description:
Nakajima Raizou is the chief maintenance officer for the aircraft aboard the http://anidb.net/ch50482 [CVN-99 Asuka II]. The tuning of the VF-0`s conventional jet engines has put his top-ranked mechanical skills to the test. He regards his aircraft and their upkeep above all else. As such, he verbally abuses his aircrafts` pilots--even as he gives them his grudging respect.
Source: http://macross.anime.net/wiki/Raizou_Nakajima
name: Nakajima Raizou
